mapper.select:
SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT e.basiSeq, e.basiName, e.basiId, e.basiPw, e.basiGender, e.basiCareer, e.basiDesc, e.basiTel, e.basiZipCode, e.basiAddr, e.basiAddrDetail, e.basiEmail, e.basiRegDate, e.basiEditDate, e.basiTosNy, e.basiUseNy, e.basiDelNy
ORDER BY e.basiSeq Asc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMySql}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ba_sitterlist( basiName, basiCareer, basiDesc, basiTel, basiZipCode, basiAddr, basiAddrDetail, basiEmail, basiDelNy )VALUES( #{basiName}, #{basiCareer}, #{basiDesc}, #{basiTel}, #{basiZipCode}, #{basiAddr}, #{basiAddrDetail}, #{basiEmail}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT e.basiSeq, e.basiName, e.basiId, e.basiPw, e.basiGender, e.basiCareer, e.basiDesc, e.basiTel, e.basiZipCode, e.basiAddr, e.basiAddrDetail, e.basiEmail, e.basiRegDate, e.basiEditDate, e.basiTosNy, e.basiUseNy, e.basiDelNy FROM bananas.ba_sitterlist e WHERE 1=1 AND e.basiSeq = #{basiSeq}
SELECT j.bareSeq, j.bareType, j.bareStar, j.bareContents, j.bareRegDate, j.bareEditDate, j.bareDelNy FROM bananas.ba_review j WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY j.bareSeq Asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ba_review( bareStar, bareContents, bareRegDate, bareEditDate )VALUES( ifNull(#{bareStar},0), #{bareContents}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT g.baopSeq, g.baopType, g.baopName, g.baopPrice, g.baopUseNy, g.baopDelNy FROM bananas.ba_option g WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY g.baopSeq Asc
